<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shifting Faces](/Feats.aspx?ID=2626) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
tailless alternate form

</column>

---

You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you. When you [Change Shape](/Actions.aspx?ID=701) into your tailless form, you gain the effects of 3rd-level [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) for 1 hour or until you shift back, except it's a [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) effect rather than an [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92).
name: Shifting Faces
